name: DRAWX4
description:
DrawX4 is a creative, social drawing game.

HOW IT WORKS

Artists take turns to draw a part of a body, then pass it on to someone else to continue. The next player must draw without seeing what has gone before. When the head, body, legs and feet have been drawn, everyone gets to see their creation.

DrawX4 is based on the Exquisite Corpse, a collaborative game invented by members of the surrealist movement in around 1925 but you may recognise it more readily as 'Consequences' or a nameless game you played as a child with a folded up piece of paper.
